EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Ron,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation a few weeks ago regarding the services we provide at MBO Partners. As a summary, there are some great resources on our website, here are a few:
1. Link to our insurance benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits 2. Link to an interactive widget that summarizes the value of MBO http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweare
Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Steve
Steven Arhancet Director of Associate Enrollment and Market Development O:703.793.6011 | M:540.560.8837 | F:703.793.6081 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive #300 Herndon, VA 20171 sarhancet@mbopartners.com www.mbopartners.com
